lines.text: Bruteski, you're a nasty little bastard aren't you? But I'll scrub the shit off you. By the time I'm finished with you, your soul will be as white as driven snow, I promise.
What are you, mister, a shit-eater or a fucking preacher?
No, I am more than that, I'm Saint fucking Peter. I'm gonna open the gates of heaven for you.
One thing you must know, master Brute, is that Doctor Babits is Hungarian. And Hungarians are remarkably stupid.
